title: Girl, 14, facing charges after 'punching a man dressed as Donald Trump' outside a haunted house
text:
A man dressed as Donald Trump was punched in the jaw by a 14-year-old girl while her friend filmed it as they waited in line at a haunted house attraction, police say.

The girl could face a misdemeanor charge of battery for the attack at the Collier County fairgrounds in Naples, Florida, on Saturday evening, the Naples Daily News reports.

The Collier County Sheriff's Office says the man and his family were in line to go into the Naples Haunted Gross House exhibit at the county fairgrounds.

Authorities say the girl walked over to the Trump look-a-like, and punched him in the jaw.

A man dressed as Donald Trump was punched in the jaw by a 14-year-old girl at Collier County fairgrounds in Naples, Florida, police say

The man told officials that the girl laughed and then ran back to her place in the line with a group of other teens.

The man reportedly went and asked the girl why she had hit him, before finding officials to report the incident.

A Collier County School system employee told police that footage of the incident had been posted on Instagram, the Daily News reported.

A deputy questioned the girl and her parents, and the girl was kicked out of the fairgrounds.

The girl's name was withheld by police because of her age.
description: A man dressed as Donald Trump was punched in the jaw by a 14-year-old girl  at the Naples Haunted Gross House at Collier County fairgrounds in Naples, Florida.
